Features

    Add candidates to your database in 1 click

    Instantly integrate with LinkedIn, email and local job boards. Add candidates in 1 click via Chrome browser extension

    Appropriate candidates' suggestions

    System algorithms suggest candidates from your database which best fit your vacancy criteria.

    Quick vacancies reports

    Prepare vacancy reports for your boss/client in seconds. No more boring stuff: we will do it for you.

    Resume parsing technology

    Upload CV in any format and CleverStaff will convert it into a structured & searchable candidate profile. Say goodbye to manual data entry.

    Customizable templates for auto-emails

    Prepare auto-emails in advance and choose when candidates receive your reply as they pass your recruiting process.

We Guarantee Your Data Security

We constantly run database backups. If hardware fails well restore the system and all the data instantly.

CleverStaff keeps your passwords and logins encrypted. You are the only one who can access them.



Encryption (https protocol) protects your data from the interception of third parties.

It's impossible to delete your database or any part of it in your CleverStaff account.

The privacy of your information is guaranteed by the CleverStaff in a legal agreement.
